content.question: Which of the following was a common theme among nineteenth-century Utopian socialists?

choices.label: Rejection of the institution of marriage
Advocacy of social and economic planning
Revolutionary overthrow of the existing order

content.answer: Advocacy of social and economic planning

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
